decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing ramp cards like Utopia Sprawl and Talisman of Impulse to accelerate the mana production, allowing for powerful Eldrazi creatures to be cast early in the game. Control elements like Kozilek's Return and Malevolent Rumble help to keep the opponent's board in check, while Ancient Stirrings and Nulldrifter provide card advantage. Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker are powerful threats that can quickly close out the game, supported by Sowing Mycospawn for additional value. Overall, the strategy revolves around ramping into big Eldrazi creatures while controlling the opponent's board.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board through various spells and abilities while also utilizing a diverse range of powerful creatures and planeswalkers. The deck leverages cards like Grist, the Hunger Tide, Wrenn and Six, Green Sun's Zenith, and Leyline Binding to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Additionally, the inclusion of powerful creatures like Omnath, Locus of Creation and Atraxa, Grand Unifier provide additional threats and win conditions. The mana base is built to support the diverse color requirements of the deck while also providing utility lands for additional advantages.

This Merfolk deck focuses on aggressively building a board presence using creatures like Master of the Pearl Trident, Tide Shaper, and Lord of Atlantis. Aether Vial helps cheat creatures into play, while cards like Tishana's Tidebinder and Harbinger of the Seas control the opponent's board. Mutavault provides additional creature pressure, and Cavern of Souls ensures spells can't be countered. Sink into Stupor disrupts the opponent's gameplan, while Chalice of the Void helps shut down opposing strategies. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a relentless stream of Merfolk creatures.

This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on utilizing flicker effects like Cloudshift and Ephemerate to generate value from cards like Skyclave Apparition and Solitude. The deck also includes creatures like Eternal Witness and Ranger-Captain of Eos to ensure consistency and provide additional utility. The deck aims to establish early board presence with aggressive creatures like Ocelot Pride and Guide of Souls, while also having the ability to disrupt opponents' strategies with cards like Witch Enchanter and White Orchid Phantom. With a versatile mana base and a mix of removal, recursion, and card advantage, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with efficient threats and disruptive plays.

The key concept of this deck is to aggressively and quickly deploy Hollow One creatures onto the battlefield while disrupting the opponent's hand and board with Burning Inquiry and Detective's Phoenix. Faithless Looting allows for card selection and graveyard manipulation, while cards like Flameblade Adept and Lightning Bolt provide additional pressure. The deck also incorporates the use of Inti, Seneschal of the Sun for added protection and versatility in combat. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of powerful creatures and disruptive spells in order to secure a quick victory.

This deck focuses on quickly filling your graveyard with powerful creatures and then bringing them back into play for a big advantage. By utilizing cards like Faithless Looting and Persist, you can discard creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Psychic Frog, and then reanimate them with Unearth or Bitter Triumph. The deck also includes disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Counterspell to protect your combo. With this strategy, you can overwhelm your opponent with powerful creatures while controlling the game with counter magic.
